pr_title: Support short custom YouTube channel URLs

timeline.message: Support short custom youtube channel urls

timeline.bodyText: There is no need to make this method public
timeline.author: TobiGr
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -49,6 +49,17 @@ public String getUrl(String id, List<String> contentFilters, String searchFilter
         return "https://www.youtube.com/" + id;
     }
 
+    /**
+     * Returns true if path conform to
+     * custom short channel urls like youtube.com/yourcustomname
+     *
+     * @param splitPath path segments array
+     * @return true - if value conform to short channel url, false - not
+     */
+    public boolean isCustomShortChannelUrl(String[] splitPath) {

timeline.bodyText: http://www.youtube.com/attribution_link?a=JdfC0C9V6ZI&u=%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DEhxJLojIE_o%26feature%3Dshare is a stream URL, but is accepted by your regex.
timeline.author: TobiGr

replies.bodyText: Hi. Thank you for review. Do you think that simply adding "attribution_link" to exlude those links with regex would be sufficent solution ? I couldn't come up with something better that that.
replies.author: Bartoshr

replies.bodyText: Mmmh, probably a list of all pages not pointing to a channel should be added to that regex
replies.author: Stypox

replies.bodyText:
Other YouTube URLs:


https://m.youtube.com/select_site


https://www.youtube.com/?app=desktop&persist_app=1


@Stypox what do you mean exactly?
replies.author: TobiGr

timeline.message: Prevent attribution_link urls to be accepted by channel links handler

timeline.author: TobiGr

replies.bodyText: // do not accept URLs which are *not channels
replies.author: opusforlife2

timeline.author: TobiGr

timeline.bodyText: Please compile this regex as a static variable in the class, otherwise it will be compiled every time
timeline.author: Stypox

timeline.message: Use static regex pattern for excluded path segments

timeline.bodyText: Please move this up to the other class attribute
timeline.author: TobiGr
